alert.note: Alert for Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 3:48PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Yellow River at Rocky Plains Rd near Rocky Plains affecting Newton County. For the Yellow River Basin...including Suwanee, Lawrenceville, Plantation Rd Lawrenceville, Tanglewood Drive Snellville, Lilburn, Snellville, Snellville, Silver Hill Rd Stone Mtn, Lithonia, Stone Mountain, Lee Road below Snellville, Lithonia, Lithonia, Lithonia, Milstead, Gees Mill Road, Snellville, Loganville, Milstead, Milstead, Milstead, Rocky Plains...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Yellow River at Rocky Plains Rd near Rocky Plains. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins of woodlands and fields near the river upstream and downstream from the gage on the Rocky Plains Road bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:46 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 17.9 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 18 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM EST.
